title: srI raamadaasa
sahitya:
shrI rAma dAsa dAsOham ana nIraja nEtra nIkEla sandEhamu

caraNam 1

 gaTTu kAnarAni guNDa rAma paTTukO dATa nIpairu teppaNTa
   
caraNam 2

 kAmAdula nakra bAdha dIrpa rAmayya nI cEti cakramu lEdA
   
caraNam 3

 cAla cittamanu nalalaku rAma celagu nIvAma hastamu vairiyagunu
   
caraNam 4

 mada matsaramulanu gajamulaku nI pada kamalAnkusha rEkha ankushamu
   
caraNam 5

 sOkadulanu parvatamulaku nI karAnkita vajra rEka vajramu
   
caraNam 6

 ahamanu jaDatava maNaci brOva sahajamau nI cEti sharamulu lEva
   
caraNam 7

 dus-karmamulanu koNDa lEgaya sEya niSkalamSa pavanajuDuNDu sadaya
   
caraNam 8

 janana maraNamanu suDuini nilpa ghanamaina nIyAgna gAdanu vaDini
   
caraNam 9

 jAti kokaru gUDinAramu prIti cEta telisikoNTimi nAma sAramu
 
caraNam 10

 pannuga bhavam ati ghOramu rAma ninnu vinAnya dEvamulanu kOramu
 
caraNam 11

 varaguNa rAjAdhi rAja rAma parama pAvana pAlita tyAgarAja
